# Unicorn Sport - School Partner Portal

## ğŸ“‹ Priority: P2 - Partnership & Group Registration Feature

> **Schools are referral partners - they send students to your tournaments.**
> **Primary verification is via NIN/Passport, not school portal.**

---

## ğŸ¯ Overview

School partnerships serve as a **referral and group registration channel**. Schools send their students to participate in tournaments. Age verification is done via **NIN or International Passport** (not through a school portal).

### Why Schools Partner With You

| What Schools Get | Description |
|------------------|-------------|
| **Student Exposure** | Their talented students get seen by international scouts |
| **Success Stories** | School reputation grows when students succeed |
| **Partnership Badge** | Listed as official Unicorn Sport partner |
| **Free Access** | No cost to partner |
| **Notifications** | Alerted when scouts are interested in their students |

### What Schools Provide

| Value | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| **Student Referrals** | Send students to participate in tournaments |
| **Group Registration** | Register multiple students at once |
| **Additional Credibility** | "Attends [School Name]" on player profile |
| **Document Support** | Help students obtain NIN/Passport if needed |

> **Note**: Primary age verification is via **NIN or International Passport** presented before tournament participation. School partnerships add credibility but are not the primary verification method.

---

---

## ğŸ“‹ Data Model

### Database Schema

```sql
-- Partner schools
CREATE TABLE schools (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    registration_number VARCHAR(100),       -- Government registration
    country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    region VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    address TEXT,
    school_type VARCHAR(50),                -- 'secondary', 'academy', 'club'
    is_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,      -- Unicorn Sport verified this school
    verified_at TIMESTAMP,
    verified_by UUID,                       -- Admin who verified
    admin_user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id), -- School's admin account
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- School-student relationships
CREATE TABLE school_students (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    school_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES schools(id),
    profile_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES profiles(id),
    student_id_number VARCHAR(100),         -- School's student ID
    enrollment_date DATE,
    current_grade VARCHAR(50),
    is_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,      -- School has verified this student
    verified_at TIMESTAMP,
    verified_by UUID,                       -- School admin who verified
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    UNIQUE(school_id, profile_id)
);

-- Verification requests
CREATE TABLE verification_requests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    profile_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES profiles(id),
    school_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES schools(id),
    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'pending',   -- 'pending', 'approved', 'rejected', 'flagged'
    claimed_dob DATE,                       -- What student claims
    verified_dob DATE,                      -- What school confirms (if different)
    reviewer_id UUID,                       -- School admin who reviewed
    reviewed_at TIMESTAMP,
    rejection_reason TEXT,
    notes TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

-- Verification documents (stored securely)
CREATE TABLE verification_documents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
    request_id UUID REFERENCES verification_requests(id),
    profile_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES profiles(id),
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,     -- 'birth_certificate', 'school_id', 'national_id'
    blob_url VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,         -- Secure storage URL
    uploaded_by UUID,
    is_verified BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    verified_by UUID,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
```

---

## ğŸ“¡ API Endpoints

### School Admin Endpoints

```http
# Dashboard
GET /api/v1/schools/dashboard
Authorization: Bearer <school_admin_token>

# Verification queue
GET /api/v1/schools/verifications/pending
GET /api/v1/schools/verifications/:id

# Verify or reject
POST /api/v1/schools/verifications/:id/approve
POST /api/v1/schools/verifications/:id/reject

# Student management
GET /api/v1/schools/students
GET /api/v1/schools/students/:profileId
```

### Player Endpoints

```http
# Request verification
POST /api/v1/verification/request
{
  "school_id": "school-uuid",
  "student_id_number": "STU-2023-001"
}

# Check status
GET /api/v1/verification/status
```

---

## ğŸ« School Types to Target

### Priority Order

| Priority | School Type | Why | Approach |
|----------|-------------|-----|----------|
| **1st** | Football Academies | Highly motivated, have records, may also record content | Direct partnership |
| **2nd** | Private Secondary Schools | Better record-keeping, sports programs | Meet with principals |
| **3rd** | Government Secondary Schools | Large student populations | Ministry introductions |
| **4th** | Youth Clubs | Have player rosters | Club management meetings |

### First 10 Target Schools (Example for Nigeria)

```
1. Pepsi Football Academy, Lagos
2. Kwara Football Academy, Ilorin
3. Midas Football Academy, Lagos
4. Gateway International School, Lagos (secondary with sports)
5. Greensprings School, Lagos
6. Atlantic Hall, Lagos
7. Loyola Jesuit College, Abuja
8. Corona Secondary School, Lagos
9. Nigerian Navy Secondary School, Lagos
10. Federal Government College, Warri
```

## ğŸ“ School Registration Form

### What to Collect in Meetings

```
SCHOOL INFORMATION
â”œâ”€â”€ School name (official)
â”œâ”€â”€ Government registration number
â”œâ”€â”€ Type (secondary school / football academy / youth club)
â”œâ”€â”€ Address
â”œâ”€â”€ Country / Region / City
â””â”€â”€ Website (if any)

ADMINISTRATOR CONTACT
â”œâ”€â”€ Full name
â”œâ”€â”€ Position/Title
â”œâ”€â”€ Email address
â”œâ”€â”€ Phone number
â””â”€â”€ Preferred contact method

VERIFICATION CAPABILITIES
â”œâ”€â”€ Do you have enrollment records with DOB?
â”œâ”€â”€ Do you keep copies of birth certificates?
â”œâ”€â”€ How many students play football?
â”œâ”€â”€ Who would handle verification requests?
â””â”€â”€ How quickly can you respond to requests?

AGREEMENT
â”œâ”€â”€ Agree to verify students when requested
â”œâ”€â”€ Agree to keep student data confidential
â”œâ”€â”€ Agree to partnership terms
â””â”€â”€ Signature / Approval
```

## ğŸš€ Implementation Priority

### Before School Meetings (Do Now)

- [ ] Simple school registration form
- [ ] School admin account creation flow
- [ ] Basic verification request page

### After First 5 Schools Sign Up

- [ ] Full school dashboard
- [ ] Verification queue with notifications
- [ ] Document viewing
- [ ] Verification history

### At Scale

- [ ] Bulk student upload
- [ ] API for school integration
- [ ] Automated reminders for pending verifications
- [ ] School analytics
